embed.title: Copy this code and paste it in your website:
errormessage:
A problem occurred fetching the data from the database.

Please refresh your browser. If the problem persists, try again later.

We apologize for the inconvenience.
sourcetext: Source: Eurostat - access to dataset
comparison_text: ${product} prices in ${country} are ${percentage}% ${highLow} than the EU average.
twitter.text: Shedding light on energy in the EU: Electricity and gas prices #Eurostat #Energy
information.title: Information
information.text:
Select a product from the circle to see the country with the highest and lowest price levels. Select a country from the drop-down list to see where it ranks among the other countries.

The source dataset is indicated at the bottom of the visualisation. More information about the different groups of goods/services can be found in the COICOP classification
